Name: zHospNo
Description: Number of hospital visits during follow-up year
Comment: Counted for 365 days from baseline assessment

Name: zHospNoUnplanned
Description: Number of unplanned hospital visits during follow-up year
Comment: Visits starting from ED or routine checkup, subset of hospital visits, counted for 365 days since baseline assessment

Name: zHospDays
Description: Days spent in hospital during follow-up year

Name: zHospOffsetUnplanned
Description: Days before first unplanned hospital visit

Name: zLTC
Description: Transferred to LTC during follow-up year

Name: zDischarge
Description: Discharged from care during follow-up year

Name: zNPIxxx
Description: Started non-pharmacological intervention during follow-up year (template)

Name: zNPIEndxxx
Description: Quit non-pharmacological intervention during follow-up year (template)
